update t_org_certificate_info
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCAL_FILENAME = #{localFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DFS_FULL_FILENAME = #{dfsFullFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_STATUS = #{operateStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_org_certificate_info set ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCAL_FILENAME = #{localFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DFS_FULL_FILENAME = #{dfsFullFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_STATUS = #{operateStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_APPLY_OPEN = #{operatorApplyOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_CONFIRM_OPEN = #{operatorConfirmOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_APPLY_CLOSE = #{operatorApplyClose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_CONFIRM_CLOSE = #{operatorConfirmClose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #{certificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFFECT_DATA = #{effectData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRY_DATA = #{expiryData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPD_TIME = #{lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
